description: Scissors is a giant desert crab who aided http://anidb.net/ch2940 [Vivi] and the http://anidb.net/ch1954 [Straw Hats] in escaping from Rainbase and http://anidb.net/ch3012 [Crocodile]. He is a friend of http://anidb.net/ch3059 [Eyelashes] the Camel and according to http://anidb.net/ch487 [Chopper]`s translations, he is described as a pervert by Eyelashes.
name: Hasami
